Name: Zombie Gotchi
About the game: Adopt your own Zombie as your virtual Pet! Enjoy its countless Animations with Amazing Graphics with unique Charm. Create your own look with more than 80 clothing parts in fantastic 2.5D scenes. Play with your zombie different mini games to get him or her happy. Features select the Name and Gender of your Zombie five different needs each with many different interactions 5 entertaining Mini Games Panorama backgrounds in which your Zombie can run around without borders different 'Styles' for the Main scene (2.5 D), Bathroom and Bedroom more than 80 clothing parts to personalize many animations and emotions direct interactions with your Zombie through gestures get experience and unlock new Content with Zombie and Humor
